availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah E. Hinds Carter in Green County, Kentucky, on December 3, 1863. Father of Aaron Carter. Farmhand in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 596.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 3, p. 457A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 001877085.
